steps.title: Prepare the Egg Mixture
instructions: In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt.

steps.title: Dip and Fry
instructions: Heat a skillet or non-stick pan over medium heat and melt a knob of butter.
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture for about 20 seconds on each side.
Fry the soaked bread slices for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown and cooked through.

steps.title: Serve
instructions: Serve the French toast hot, topped with maple syrup, fresh berries, and a dusting of powdered sugar.
